f0a55fff154697c42a3f3bd3783d94cd.title: Nighttime Lights Intensity Data for Arequipa, Peru
f0a55fff154697c42a3f3bd3783d94cd.shortDescription: Detailed analysis of annual average nighttime lights intensity across various districts in Arequipa, Peru, reflecting urbanization levels.
f0a55fff154697c42a3f3bd3783d94cd.description: This document presents a comprehensive dataset of annual average nighttime lights intensity from DMSP-OLS satellite data for Arequipa, Peru. It includes detailed measurements in nW/cm²/sr across multiple districts, specifying country, city, district, province, latitude, longitude, intensity levels, and unit. The data reveals varying degrees of urbanization, with higher values in more urbanized areas like Arequipa city, and lower values in less developed regions such as Ocoña and Caravelí, underlining the economic and development disparities within the region.
f0a55fff154697c42a3f3bd3783d94cd.fullDescriptionOfAllContents: The dataset includes information on nighttime lights intensity measured in nW/cm²/sr for multiple districts within the province of Arequipa, Peru. Each record specifies the country, city, district, province, latitude, longitude, nighttime lights intensity, unit, and a brief description of the data's relevance. The data indicates varying levels of urbanization and development, with higher values corresponding to more urbanized areas such as Arequipa city and lower or zero values in less developed districts like Ocoña and Caravelí.
f0a55fff154697c42a3f3bd3783d94cd.compressedFullDescriptionOfAllContents: Comprehensive dataset detailing nighttime lights intensity in nW/cm²/sr across Arequipa's districts, showing urbanization via varying intensity levels. Includes geo-coordinates and urban development insights, highlighting disparities.

74640396b70f2609cfff85f3b9af853f.title: Solar Energy Potential in Arequipa, Peru
74640396b70f2609cfff85f3b9af853f.shortDescription: Detailed dataset listing solar energy potential (GHI values) across multiple districts in Arequipa, Peru.
74640396b70f2609cfff85f3b9af853f.description: This document provides a comprehensive dataset detailing the Global Horizontal Irradiation (GHI) values for various cities and districts in the Arequipa region of Peru. It includes data entries for each location's latitude, longitude, and GHI values, essential for solar energy project planning.
74640396b70f2609cfff85f3b9af853f.fullDescriptionOfAllContents: The document contains a table with data entries for various locations in Arequipa, Peru, detailing the latitude, longitude, and Global Horizontal Irradiation (GHI) values for each area. GHI is a measure of the solar energy available at each location, which is crucial for planning solar energy projects. The table covers cities and districts such as Arequipa, La Joya, Alto Selva Alegre, Cerro Colorado, Paucarpata, Yanahuara, Cayma, Miraflores, Sachaca, JL Bustamante, Camaná, Caravelí, Aplao, Chivay, Majes, Chuquibamba, Mollendo, and Cotahuasi, providing their respective GHI values.

9c200ec6352fb4305580394551395bae.title: Population Density Data of Arequipa, Peru

9c200ec6352fb4305580394551395bae.description: This document presents a comprehensive table detailing population densities in distinct districts throughout the city and province of Arequipa, Peru. It includes specific data on population density, measured in people per square kilometer, for each district such as Arequipa, La Joya, Alto Selva Alegre, Cerro Colorado, and more, highlighting the variation from densely to sparsely populated areas.
9c200ec6352fb4305580394551395bae.fullDescriptionOfAllContents: The document contains a table with columns titled Country, City, District, Province, and Population Density (people/km²), enumerating various districts within the city and province of Arequipa, Peru. Each row provides specific population density data for districts such as Arequipa, La Joya, Alto Selva Alegre, Cerro Colorado, and others, ranging from densely populated areas to sparsely populated zones.
9c200ec6352fb4305580394551395bae.compressedFullDescriptionOfAllContents: The document features a data table listing population density (people/km²) for various districts in Arequipa, Peru, such as Arequipa, La Joya, Alto Selva Alegre, and Cerro Colorado, indicating a range from high to low population densities.
